body.p: We the undersigned having known Joseph F. Adams from infancy regret exceedingly that circumstantial Evidence has convicted him of the crime of which he is accused We for the sake of his widowed Mother recommend him to your kind consideration knowing him to have always been a kind hearted peacible boy, we trust you will grant the petition that accompanies this with the pleading of his afflicted Mother

Sarah Adams
Alexr M. Mackay
Shelton Lowry
Pink Varble
L Chilson
M Lane
J Gibert
Geo Sangle
Michael Shearor
R W Reed
William Hall
I Cheerfully testify to the within he having worked for me for Years
